scc.releaseInfo:
- For All Platforms - -- Updated SCAP content based on NIWC content for DISA Q3 2025 release of STIG manuals -- Updated reports to show DISA STIG check text -- Updated internal dependencies -- Fixed several minor issues, see release notes for details.
- For macOS -- Added support for macOS 13, 14, 15 -- Added NIST/NIWC collaboration DISA STIG SCAP content for macOS 13, 14, 15
- For Linux - -- Added support for RHEL9 aarch64 and Ubuntu 22 arm64 -- Added NIWC Enhanced content for Ubuntu 24.04
